pageInfoSection.heading: GET YOUR MESSAGE OUT THERE
pageInfoSection.description:
Commercials have changed dramatically with the many different media outlets of today. How do you convey your product's features and benefits to reach your targeted audience and grab their attention?

Do you use online pre-roll videos often seen on YouTube? Perhaps it would be best to use Over-the-Top videos for content streamed on the Internet. This is a great way to reach a younger audience who view everything on their devices. Or does your audience tend to watch traditional cable or network television?

Stanton Creative Media (A Todd Productions Company) has experience in developing commercials for all of these different media outlets, ranging from 15 to 30 second spots to videos that last several minutes. The goal is to immediately grab the audience's attention and quickly tell your story in a convincing fashion. Our team will work closely with your staff to develop a script, brainstorm ideas for video scenarios, film, record, and provide post-production editing with narration and music as needed.
pageInfoSection.seoTitle: Spread The Word Of Your Business
pageInfoSection.seoDescription: Stanton Creative Media (A Todd Productions Company)' has experience in developing commercial video production for all different media outlets in Maumee and Northwest Ohio

samples.title: CLEANING SERVICE TV COMMERCIAL
samples.description: Sleek, stylish, and polished professional commercial showing off a wide range of the cleaning service areas of expertise to entice clients to schedule an appointment!

samples.title: INDUSTRIAL MACHINE COMPANY TV COMMERCIAL
samples.description: An informative TV advertisement that explains to potential clients the history and experience of the company and why they would make a great partner in the industrial space!

samples.title: CLEANING COMPANY HANDWASHING TV COMMERCIAL
samples.description: A fun yet informative TV commercial encouraging children to practice proper hand hygiene while expressing to them why it is so important.

samples.title: BEHAVIORAL HEALTH CENTER PRE-ROLL
samples.description: Quick pre-roll video designed to be front-loaded and capture the audience attention within the first 5 seconds before they hit the “skip” button. Delivering the message that this behavioral health center is helpful and important in the community, and inviting all who are looking for help to check them out.
